name: Blue River Aviation
about: Blue River Aviation, located in Palmer, Alaska, is a premier flight school dedicated to professional aviation training. Founded by Jamie Hastings, who began flight instructing in 2009, the school offers a wide range of courses, including Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Instrument Rating, and specialized training in floatplanes, seaplanes, and ski planes. With a focus on preparing students for careers from airline piloting to off-airport backcountry flying, Blue River Aviation provides personalized training in diverse Alaskan flying conditions. The school is supported by a skilled team and a fleet of advanced aircraft, ensuring top-notch instruction and a commitment to safety. Blue River Aviation attracts students worldwide with its unique Alaskan flying experience and comprehensive aviation services.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Seaplane Rating
Night Rating"]
